Title: Requires that any father of an out-of-wedlock child be listed on such child's birth certificate
Summary: Requires that any father of an out-of-wedlock child be listed on such child's birth certificate; provides for a procedure for such father to contest such listing.
LawCode: Amd ยง4135, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to birth certificates
